title: AI Chatbot Jailbreaks Reveal Private Data from OpenAI and Amazon
description: OpenAI now blocks prompts that researchers say tricked ChatGPT into revealing contact information of OpenAI employees.

title: US Defense Department Urged to Integrate Bitcoin to Maintain Superpower Status
description: A U.S. Space Force major has urged the Department of Defense to integrate Bitcoin as an “offset” strategy. Emphasizing that “Integration of this technology could revolutionize national defense strategies in cyberspace,” he stressed: “Addressing this could be vital for the U.S. to maintain its position as a global superpower and leader among nations.” ‘Bitcoin Represents […]
